name: Five Nights at Candy's
storyline:
This seems... familiar and different. Welcome to Candy's Burger and Fries, the Number 1 Animatronic Burger Restaurant!

We're so much better than Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! Who likes Pizza when you can have a delicious burger! We have our own animatronic that you can draw on!
Come and enjoy your time with the gang: there's Candy the head hancho himself! His amazing partner Cindy, the rocking expert Chester, our helpful little waiter Penguin, and finally the World's First Drawable Animatronic Blank!
summary:
No company is without a rival.

Freddy Fazbear's New Pizzeria has closed for good. And so, another restaurant is going to take its place in the world of entertainment.

What could go wrong?
